title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Generation – conventional, non–conventional and renewable energy resources, synchronous generators. HVAC Transmission - Transmission line trends and preliminaries, corona effects - power loss and audible noise, radio interference. HVDC Transmission -General comparison of A.C. and D.C. transmission, AC\DC converters and components, control and protection for HVDC systems. reactive power management. integrated AC-DC systems Distribution Systems - Radial, ring – power quality, automation, power system component modeling, power flow and fault analysis Protection - Typical faults in power systems, basic protection elements (circuit breakers, isolators, sectionalizing switches, fuses and relays), relay types and protection principles, coordination of protection devices.
